text: @TrumpWarRoom @maddow Since there seems to be two schools of thought on this subject, people COULD just watch the video of Trump at his last rally saying "the #coronavirus is the Democrats newest hoax." One would think that watching and listening to him say this would remove all doubt.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
